summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EasyMoneyLoans Staff Portal. All features tested successfully including master password unlock flow, user login, dashboard stats, navigation, loan management, fraud alerts, admin panel, audit logs, and export functionality. 100% of backend API tests passed (20/20) and all UI flows work correctly.
passed_tests: Master password unlock with TestMaster123! - SUCCESS
Dashboard displays stats (13 customers, 4 open loans, R10,956.00 outstanding, 8 paid loans) - SUCCESS
Navigation sidebar works correctly (all links functional) - SUCCESS
Customers page loads (13 records displayed) - SUCCESS
Loan Register page loads (12 loans found) - SUCCESS
Fraud Alerts page loads (6 quick-close, 3 duplicates) - SUCCESS
New Loan dialog opens from Loan Register page - SUCCESS
Admin Panel loads with all tabs (Users, Settings, Backup, Updates, AD, Security) - SUCCESS
Audit Logs page loads (209 entries) - SUCCESS
Export page loads with time period and export options - SUCCESS
API: Master password status endpoint - PASSED
API: List loans by status - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: All API endpoints return proper status codes and response structures
Authentication with JWT tokens works correctly
User passwords are not exposed in API responses (password_hash excluded)
Audit log integrity verification chain is working
Fraud detection (quick-close and duplicate customers) functioning correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested successfully. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_staff_portal.py cover master password, auth, dashboard, customers, loans, users, audit logs, settings, AD config, export, and backup. Frontend navigation works for all pages: Dashboard, Loan Register, Customers, Fraud Alerts, Export, Admin Panel, Audit Logs. Test credentials: Master password=TestMaster123!, Admin login=admin/admin123. Dashboard shows 13 customers, 4 open loans, 8 paid loans, R10,956 outstanding.
